svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - July 22 2023
July 22 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
July 22, 2023" date: "2023-07-22"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
‚Ä¢ Latest all core devs ‚Äì execution (ACDE) call video . Summary by Tim Beiko .¬† Notes from Tim Beiko and Christine Kim : Dencun testing
continues with devnet 7 and a Sepolia shadow fork Client teams implementing Dencun EIPs ready for devnet 8 EIP6780 (selfdestruct only in
same tx) edge cases clarification, burn used by some L2s Discussions on adding parent beacon block roots to execution payload, adding
getBlockReceipts & removing mining from Execution API and standardizing JWT location EIP/ERC repo split ( EIP7329 ): core devs in favor,
Greg Colvin (EIP editor) still opposed
Latest all core devs ‚Äì execution (ACDE) call video . Summary by Tim Beiko .¬† Notes from Tim Beiko and Christine Kim :
‚Ä¢ Dencun testing continues with devnet 7 and a Sepolia shadow fork
Dencun testing continues with devnet 7 and a Sepolia shadow fork
‚Ä¢ Client teams implementing Dencun EIPs ready for devnet 8
Client teams implementing Dencun EIPs ready for devnet 8
‚Ä¢ EIP6780 (selfdestruct only in same tx) edge cases clarification, burn used by some L2s
EIP6780 (selfdestruct only in same tx) edge cases clarification, burn used by some L2s
‚Ä¢ Discussions on adding parent beacon block roots to execution payload, adding getBlockReceipts & removing mining from Execution API and
standardizing JWT location
Discussions on adding parent beacon block roots to execution payload, adding getBlockReceipts & removing mining from Execution API and
‚Ä¢ EIP/ERC repo split ( EIP7329 ): core devs in favor, Greg Colvin (EIP editor) still opposed
EIP/ERC repo split ( EIP7329 ): core devs in favor, Greg Colvin (EIP editor) still opposed
‚Ä¢ KZG Ceremony 122k contributions, lobby closes July 23 (tomorrow!)
KZG Ceremony 122k contributions, lobby closes July 23 (tomorrow!)
Prague + Electra upgrade
‚Ä¢ EIP7251 FAQ : would allow more than 32 ETH to be staked
EIP7251 FAQ : would allow more than 32 ETH to be staked
‚Ä¢ Suggest a name for the Prague + Electra upgrade
Suggest a name for the Prague + Electra upgrade
Layer 1
‚Ä¢ Ben Edgington: Upgrading Ethereum book new sections on LMD GHOST & Casper FFG
Client releases
‚Ä¢ Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.9.2 : hotfix for gossip blocks with unknown block parent errors and changed block production wait cutoff
Nimbus v23.7.0 : validator client optimisations and improves validator performance Teku v23.6.2 : minor bug fixes and dependencies updates
Consensus layer:
‚Ä¢ Lodestar v1.9.2 : hotfix for gossip blocks with unknown block parent errors and changed block production wait cutoff
Lodestar v1.9.2 : hotfix for gossip blocks with unknown block parent errors and changed block production wait cutoff
‚Ä¢ Nimbus v23.7.0 : validator client optimisations and improves validator performance
Nimbus v23.7.0 : validator client optimisations and improves validator performance
‚Ä¢ Teku v23.6.2 : minor bug fixes and dependencies updates
Teku v23.6.2 : minor bug fixes and dependencies updates
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Nethermind v1.20.1 : fix for v1.20.0 which caused Prysm error Reth v0.1.0-alpha.4 : removed downloader heuristic
preventing syncing, jemallocator default on UNIX and added transaction pool maintenance metrics
Execution layer:
‚Ä¢ Nethermind v1.20.1 : fix for v1.20.0 which caused Prysm error
Nethermind v1.20.1 : fix for v1.20.0 which caused Prysm error
‚Ä¢ Reth v0.1.0-alpha.4 : removed downloader heuristic preventing syncing, jemallocator default on UNIX and added transaction pool
maintenance metrics
Reth v0.1.0-alpha.4 : removed downloader heuristic preventing syncing, jemallocator default on UNIX and added transaction pool maintenance
metrics
For Stakers
‚Ä¢ Staking directory : directory of staking providers
Research
‚Ä¢ Data availability sampling (DAS) eprint : prove existing constructions secure, propose new constructions with benchmark & trade-offs
Data availability sampling (DAS) eprint : prove existing constructions secure, propose new constructions with benchmark & trade-offs
‚Ä¢ Threshold encrypted transaction pools : tradeoffs of using for MEV mitigation
Threshold encrypted transaction pools : tradeoffs of using for MEV mitigation
Layer 2
‚Ä¢ Celo propose rollup migration , initially OP Stack, decentralized sequencer using Celo‚Äôs validator set, offchain data availability via
Eigen Layer and 1-block finality
Celo propose rollup migration , initially OP Stack, decentralized sequencer using Celo‚Äôs validator set, offchain data availability via

zkSync Era shadow testing Boojum (STARK-based proof system)

Mantle (optimistic rollup) alpha is live
‚Ä¢ Consensys Linea (zk rollup) alpha is live
Consensys Linea (zk rollup) alpha is live

L2BEAT: upgrade process of L2s [PDF]
EIPs/Standards
‚Ä¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7336 : Interactive across multiple registries ERC7361 : Metadata hash with decentralized validation (ERC721
extension)
‚Ä¢ ERC7336 : Interactive across multiple registries
ERC7336 : Interactive across multiple registries
‚Ä¢ ERC7361 : Metadata hash with decentralized validation (ERC721 extension)
ERC7361 : Metadata hash with decentralized validation (ERC721 extension)

Stuff for developers
‚Ä¢ Solidity v0.8.21 : Language features: access events from other contracts & immutable variable initialization restrictions relaxed
Addresses ‚Äústack too deep‚Äù errors for unoptimized code from IR-based code generation Bug fixes: legacy code generation always generate
code for expression in <expression>.selector and Yul optimizer FullInliner evaluation order website makeover
Solidity v0.8.21 :
‚Ä¢ Language features: access events from other contracts & immutable variable initialization restrictions relaxed
Language features: access events from other contracts & immutable variable initialization restrictions relaxed
‚Ä¢ Addresses ‚Äústack too deep‚Äù errors for unoptimized code from IR-based code generation
Addresses ‚Äústack too deep‚Äù errors for unoptimized code from IR-based code generation
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes: legacy code generation always generate code for expression in <expression>.selector and Yul optimizer FullInliner evaluation
order

website makeover

Ecosystem

Notable at app layer
‚Ä¢ Aave GHO (overcollateralized stablecoin) live on mainnet, Aave v3 supplied assets used as collateral
Aave GHO (overcollateralized stablecoin) live on mainnet, Aave v3 supplied assets used as collateral
‚Ä¢ UniswapX (aggregator): gas-free swaps with MEV protection & no cost for failed transactions, beta
UniswapX (aggregator): gas-free swaps with MEV protection & no cost for failed transactions, beta
‚Ä¢ Ajna (lending) live on mainnet, no governance or external price feeds
Ajna (lending) live on mainnet, no governance or external price feeds
‚Ä¢ OpenSea Deals : create offers to swap NFTs for NFTs & WETH
OpenSea Deals : create offers to swap NFTs for NFTs & WETH

Job Listings
‚Ä¢ EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team seek ZK circuits engineer
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable to abcoathup.eth.¬† Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens

General

real time.
